name: Eggs vs Pans
description:
This game contains:

  • A bird (with sunglasses)
  • My friend john
  • Lots of bad pans :(
  • Maybe some cannons
  • Some eggs

Protect the eggs, load your weapons with eggs, try to get as many eggs as possible, upgrade your base with eggs, don't let the eggs get eaten, if you don't like eggs this game is not for you , EGGS! If you win, you will get eggs.

  • Drag with the left mouse button to move the character
  • Drag with the right mouse button to move the camera
